idea-plugin.name: Niddler
idea-plugin.description: This plugin enables the niddler ui inside the IDE
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.0 - First 'public' release
  • 1.0.1 - Filtering was not case insensitive
  • 1.0.0 - Disconnect button
  • 0.0.19 - Filtering on url
  • 0.0.18 - Fixed HAR export of base64, charles did not like url encoding. Show status line with code when we have it
  • 0.0.17 - Fixed HAR exports using wrong url
  • 0.0.16 - Fixed exception when the server uses a different format. Support for exporting to HAR 1.2
  • 0.0.15 - Better handle empty bodies (from network requests/replies)
  • 0.0.14 - Support for actual network requests
  • 0.0.13 - Experimental export for exporting to curl. Highlight row when right-clicking cell
  • 0.0.12 - Fixed non-themed UI in details and reworked details UI
  • 0.0.11 - Support copy of message detail values and header names
  • 0.0.10 - Support for linked mode (alpha)
  • 0.0.9 - Remove required dependency on adb
